languages.text: "Посланни{mf|к|ца} небес, сегодня вы спасли обреченных, отринутых собственной звездой и Бессмертным! Это ли не чудо? Пусть удача всегда будет к вам столь же благосклонна, сколь были вы к нижайшим слугам Его".

traits.locale_text: "Посланни{mf|к|ца} небес, сегодня вы спасли обреченных, отринутых собственной звездой и Бессмертным! Это ли не чудо? Пусть удача всегда будет к вам столь же благосклонна, сколь были вы к нижайшим слугам Его".

languages.text: "Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."
languages.original_text: "Посланни{mf|к|ца} небес, сегодня вы спасли обреченных, отринутых собственной звездой и Бессмертным! Это ли не чудо? Пусть удача всегда будет к вам столь же благосклонна, сколь были вы к нижайшим слугам Его".

traits.locale_text: "Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Exalted One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

"Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Exalted One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

"Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

"Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

"Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

languages.text: 「天の使節よ、あなたは今日、この星とイモータルにさえ拒絶された罪深き者たちの命を救いました！これを奇跡と呼ばずしてなんと言う？あなたがあの御方の卑しいしもべに恵みをもたらしてくれたように、運命もまたあなたに慈悲深いものでありますように」
languages.original_text: "Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

traits.locale_text: 「天の使節よ、あなたは今日、この星とイモータルにさえ拒絶された罪深き者たちの命を救いました！これを奇跡と呼ばずしてなんと言う？あなたがあの御方の卑しいしもべに恵みをもたらしてくれたように、運命もまたあなたに慈悲深いものでありますように」

languages.text: « Émissaire céleste, aujourd'hui vous avez sauvé la vie de damnés rejetés par l'Immortel et par leur propre étoile ! C'est un miracle, ça ne fait aucun doute ! Que la fortune vous sourit, comme elle a souri à Ses misérables serviteurs lorsque vous avez décidé de les secourir. »
languages.original_text: "Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

traits.locale_text: « Émissaire céleste, aujourd'hui vous avez sauvé la vie de damnés rejetés par l'Immortel et par leur propre étoile ! C'est un miracle, ça ne fait aucun doute ! Que la fortune vous sourit, comme elle a souri à Ses misérables serviteurs lorsque vous avez décidé de les secourir. »

languages.text: “天国的使者，就连神皇与星辰都抛弃了我们这些该死的罪人，可你却拯救了我们的性命！这实在是个伟大的奇迹！愿幸运之神永远眷顾你！就像你眷顾祂卑微的仆人一样！”
languages.original_text: "Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

traits.locale_text: “天国的使者，就连神皇与星辰都抛弃了我们这些该死的罪人，可你却拯救了我们的性命！这实在是个伟大的奇迹！愿幸运之神永远眷顾你！就像你眷顾祂卑微的仆人一样！”

languages.text: «{mf|Enviado Divino|Enviada Divina}, ¡hoy ha salvado las vidas de unas pobres almas desamparadas por su propia estrella y el Inmortal! ¿Cómo no va a ser un milagro? Que la fortuna {mf|le|la} tenga siempre en gracia como usted ha hecho con Sus humildes siervos».
languages.original_text: "Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Enviado Divino|Enviada Divina}, ¡hoy ha salvado las vidas de unas pobres almas desamparadas por su propia estrella y el Inmortal! ¿Cómo no va a ser un milagro? Que la fortuna {mf|le|la} tenga siempre en gracia como usted ha hecho con Sus humildes siervos».

languages.text: "{mf|Himmlischer Gesandter|Himmlische Gesandte}, heute habt Ihr das Leben der Verdammten gerettet, die selbst von ihrem eigenen Stern und dem Unsterblichen verstoßen wurden! Wie kann das kein Wunder sein? Möge das Schicksal immer so gnädig mit Euch sein wie Ihr mit seinen niederen Dienern."
languages.original_text: "Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Himmlischer Gesandter|Himmlische Gesandte}, heute habt Ihr das Leben der Verdammten gerettet, die selbst von ihrem eigenen Stern und dem Unsterblichen verstoßen wurden! Wie kann das kein Wunder sein? Möge das Schicksal immer so gnädig mit Euch sein wie Ihr mit seinen niederen Dienern."

languages.text: "Kutsal Elçi, bugün kendi yıldızları ve Ölümsüz'ün reddettiği lanetlilerin hayatını kurtardınız! Gerçek bir mucize bu! Talih, sizin bu düşük hizmetkârlara gösterdiğiniz inayeti size göstersin."
languages.original_text: "Heavenly Envoy, today you saved the lives of the damned who even their own star and the Immortal One chose to rebuke! How is this not a miracle? May fortune always be as gracious to you as you have been to His lowly servants."
